publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1421 Dave Thompson: Highland Council Budget—That the Parliament congratulates the Independent/Scottish National Party-led Highland Council administration on delivering both a freeze in council tax and growth in key frontline services; welcomes the additional funding put in place for home care provision and voluntary sector support, the £8.3 million additional investment in the new community schools programme and a record £65 million investment in Transport, Environment and Community Services, and finally commends Highland Council on presenting an excellent budget while working within the constraints of a tight settlement.
S3M-1421 Highland Council Budget (lodged on 26 February 2008) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-1421 Dave Thompson: Highland Council Budget—That the Parliament congratulates the Independent/Scottish National Party-led Highland Council administration on delivering both a freeze in council tax and growth in key frontline services; welcomes the additional funding put in place for home care provision and voluntary sector support, the £8.3 million additional investment in the new community schools programme and a record £65 million investment in Transport, Environment and Community Services, and finally commends Highland Council on presenting an excellent budget while working within the constraints of a tight settlement. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn
